Title: Competition and conflicts on resource use
Source: Competition and Conflicts on Resource Use
Abstract: © Springer International Publishing Switzerland 2015.This book reflects on the causes of resource-based conflicts and competition, and presents solutions for safely and sustainably providing resources with a focus on material flow management. The contributions from different disciplines highlight issues such as safe access to resources, conflicts over water and energy supplies, waste of strategic mineral resources, sustainable resource consumption, and renewable energy technologies.
